text: A massive earthquake has struck the city center, causing widespread damage.

Hurricane Ida has made landfall, bringing heavy rains and winds.
Tsunami alert issued after a 7.8 magnitude quake off the coast.
Wildfires continue to spread across the forested areas, displacing thousands.
Emergency crews are rescuing people trapped after the landslide.
A tornado destroyed several homes in the southern region.
Dozens injured after an explosion in the industrial zone.
Rescue operations are underway after the building collapse.
Severe drought is affecting crop yields across the country.
